structured.description: A man with a bald head and a full reddish-brown beard is depicted from the chest up, wearing a formal suit and tie. He is smiling warmly at the viewer against a dark blue background featuring a glowing digital network pattern, presenting a professional yet friendly appearance. The overall presentation suggests a confident individual in a tech-oriented or business context.
structured.facial_features: Bald head, full reddish-brown beard, dark eyebrows, and visible teeth.
structured.expression: A warm, open-mouthed smile with visible white teeth.
structured.attire: Black suit jacket, white collared shirt, and a light blue patterned necktie.
structured.palette: Dominant colours include dark blue, black, white, light blue, and reddish-brown, with bright white and light blue glowing accents in the background. The lighting is bright and even on the subject's face.
structured.background: A dark blue background featuring a glowing, interconnected network pattern of lines and dots.

style_profile: neon-lit anime portrait with confident tech leader energy
